text: Orkla is a Norwegian conglomerate operating in the Nordic region, Eastern Europe, Asia and the US. Orkla operates in the branded consumer goods, aluminium solutions and financial investment sectors. It's head office is in Oslo, Norway. == History == Orkla started out in 1654 with iron mining. In 1929, Orkla became listed on the Oslo Stock Exchange. == References == Category:Conglomerate companies Category:Companies of Norway Category:Organizations based in Oslo Category:1654 establishments Category:1650s establishments in Europe
title: Orkla
